name: Undead Survival Alpha Testing
description:
This is a zombie survival indie game that is in its alpha stage.  Currently,  there are up to 5 weapons that you can buy from the shop.  You are allowed to buy ammo from the weapons and sell them if needed.  The zombies are one hit kill, but each round they grow in numbers.  Find strategies to conserve ammo and defeat the zombie horde - but be careful, every round the amount of cash you get from killing zombies decreases.

There are a few known bugs, but if you find any, please write a comment below, or email us at grayirongames@gmail.com, we look forward to hearing from you.
